1010100001110110 0111101110001001 1 -> sum: 0010010000000000, cout: 1
0001100110111000 1010110100101001 0 -> sum: 1100011011100001, cout: 0
1000000011001111 0010101001101101 1 -> sum: 1010101100111101, cout: 0
1010001101010000 1110010100010100 0 -> sum: 1000100001100100, cout: 1
1010010111000001 0001101100011000 0 -> sum: 1100000011011001, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
